mutants.original_line: shifted_arr = [val - max_val for val in arr]
mutants.mutated_line: shifted_arr = [val + max_val for val in arr]

mutants.original_line: shifted_arr = [val - max_val for val in arr]
mutants.mutated_line: shifted_arr = [val * max_val for val in arr]

mutants.original_line: softmax_arr = [val / sum_exp for val in exp_arr]
mutants.mutated_line: softmax_arr = [val * sum_exp for val in exp_arr]

mutants.original_line: softmax_arr = [val / sum_exp for val in exp_arr]
mutants.mutated_line: softmax_arr = [val // sum_exp for val in exp_arr]
